This was our favorite of the tapas bars we visited in Barcelona.  It's cozy, the food is excellent and the service was excellent.  We had the sauteed squid (the whole squid is sliced and laid out on the plate,), lamb and a vegetable dish.  We sat at one of the small tables rather than at the bar.  The server was pleasant and very helpful in answering questions.  I would definitely return and highly recommend it.
